name: Gaia
storyline: You play as Gaia, a young girl who is growing up in the Netherlands alongside her little brother Luca and her parents Stefany and Max. When Gaia is with her brother and father on a trip to Amsterdam, she wonders a little too far ahead while her father can't leave her little brother alone. This starts an epic adventure that you will never forget and will show the importance of being good to the environment.
summary: A personal game about the maker's daughter with a link to our world's problems. Gaia is a story-driven platformer that takes the player through the world of Greek Mythology and leaves the player with the feeling that everyone can change the world for the better.
